record.dc:title: 164BN74 Cherry, Benton County, Tennessee. Burial 84BN61. Adult male, partly flexed, head north on back, face west, feet at pelvis, hands at shoulders, artifacts at legs. Stratum I, bottom; but in pit 29, which cuts other pits and is probably a burial pit. Square 18R16. Direction West.
record.wpa:comments: Institution has illustrations of burial on file.
